name: Movie Food Maker Dessert Salon - Make Cake & Milkshake Drinks!
name_original: Movie Food Maker Dessert Salon - Make Cake & Milkshake Drinks!
description:
Get ready for the big Movie Night and make some food!!

Popcorn, soda, desserts, and much more!!

Remember, you can't watch a movie on an empty stomach!!

Have fun and enjoy playing this game!!
